Module PacManMaven
Package com.GameObjects.PacMan

Class PacMan

java.lang.Object
com.GameObjects.GameObject
com.GameObjects.PacMan.PacMan
public class PacMan extends GameObject
Class represents the pac man in the game world Class extend the GameObject class to be included in the main gameLoop

    • tryMove

      private boolean tryMove​(MoveDirection moveDirection)
      Method checks wheter the move is possible
      Parameters:
      moveDirection - - direction in which to try the move
      Returns:
      true if possible, false otherwise

    • move

      private void move()
      Method moves pacman in the gameWorld according to it's current move direction. If move is illegal, it stops pacman in place.
